website_summaries.verdict: While more expensive, this is overall a great quality, effective suit that sheds less than other options.
pros: Color options include Woodland or Dry Grass
Camouflage is very dense and effective
Offers a large amount of threads that are double-stitched
Superior quality, and it looks great (when you can see it)
Strong, lightweight mesh frame makes it very breathable
cons: A little pricey compared to other options
The larger amount of strings make it difficult to untangle right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Fits over gear. Great find
customer_reviews.text: Fits over Kevlar helmet, vest with trauma plates and boots. Material is plenty. I'm 5'6" 190 lbs. You can't go wrong with this suit if you're prepping. Rifle wrap fits perfectly with addition of a rifle/shotgun sock. Not much else needs to be done when it arrives, just put it on and freak out your friends! It does snag additional materials like the surrounding leaves and pine needles but to me, just adds to the intended use. I will be doing more business with Arcturus.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: ... fits a little large and the quality seems really good I've had it for about two months now
customer_reviews.text: This suit may not be sniper quality but it damn sure gets the job done with the right prepping I've used it for hunting and had boar and deer walk out less than 20 feet away from me and could not even see me it fits a little large and the quality seems really good I've had it for about two months now, it will pick up leaves and sticks but that's just added camo if your planning on using this for hunting or airsoft this is the way to go stitching is very durable and it breathes very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Suit...Worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased as part of a Halloween costume. The suits are well made, however they do come inside out and take quite a bit of time to finger comb through to make the strings lay nice. Lost some strings while combing, however it was pretty minimal considering how much there is. The suit is comfortable, breathable, and of good quality. You get what you pay for... so if you want a quality suit that will last, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: S and E

customer_reviews.title: but he says that makes it better because the more debris it collects
customer_reviews.text: My16 year old requested this to use for airsoft games in the fields near our house. All kinds of things stick to it (pinestraw, leaves, etc), but he says that makes it better because the more debris it collects, the more authentic the camo becomes. Lightweight and breathable. Easy to put on and take off. He even wore it as a Halloween costume this year, because he didn't have a costume to wear while walking with his younger siblings. Didn't expect it to be such an attention getter! He's in the photo. (the princess is sitting on him)
customer_reviews.author: RayfordsDaughter

customer_reviews.title: My chest size is something like 56 or 58" and there is plenty of room ...
customer_reviews.text: The suit "fit as expected" - I wanted it to be large and baggy. I ordered the XL since I am 6' 4" (w/shoes). It covers really well! My chest size is something like 56 or 58" and there is plenty of room to wear a heavy winter jacket underneath still. As one reviewer already stated, it helps a lot if you run your fingers through the strings gently to let them down as they come pretty tangled from the manufacturer. I spent about 4 hours doing that, and the suit turned out mega nice! Then I laid the suit outside (for our area scent) and it looks like a large clump of sod. :-). Too cool!
customer_reviews.author: BigBot3031

customer_reviews.title: ... ghillie suit was a gift for my son he loved it and it was of good quality
customer_reviews.text: This ghillie suit was a gift for my son he loved it and it was of good quality. There's a little bit of TLC involved when the suit arrives you have to hand untangle everything for it to look right. But it works great out in the field. You literally disappear into the bushes and the surrounding habitat.. I like it so much I want one for myself now !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nephi silver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ghillie suit in "Dry Grass" and it is outstanding... There is no chemical smell at all... it is full and does not shed. You couldn't ask for a better commercial civilian ghillie suit in my opinion. I highly recommend it. I also purchased another ghillie in woodlands from another brand the same day and it is not even close to the quality of this suit. I am returning the other suit and ordering the woodlands from Arcturus... literally twice the suit . hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Work on QA/QC......
customer_reviews.text: I've been Active Army for over a decade, and you definitely sent me Woodland Pattern when I ordered Dry Grass. Which of course you labeled Dry Grass, which means your QA/QC needs work. Really disappointed. I bought this for the teal opener in Kansas this weekend to film, which woodland won't work in cattails. I'd just exchange, but this has literally ruined my plans. Thanks for the wrong product! Heart broken...
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great very happy with i,t it does shed a little bit of threads when you comb it out.It does look like it's very good quality. My complaints are the bags are stored in is too small and the spacing between the rows of threads needs to be closer but all in all it's not bad you definitely have to comb it out when you first get it and I use one of those big combs from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Falcon5000

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok BUT
customer_reviews.text: It's all right, they should have made the pieces of yarn different lengths. For the money, they should have broken the pattern up. In other words, if you were standing up, and didn't have a thick bush or a tree in front of you. You could be spotted pretty easy. I ended up buying more of the same color yarn and adding to it to break up the pattern of 10 inches and then a line, 10 inches and then a line, then 10 inches a then a line ETC.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I like it, would probably work as it came in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, would probably work as it came in the mail, but I really did not like the way it was layered. Far to much of a man made look to it. I ordered a few bags of extra thread and have added much longer threads between the existing layers. LOTS of work but gives the suit a MUCH better look and more natural in appearance. I would recommend they extend the threads to about a foot long and random pattern not such a constant. I will include a picture of mine when I am done adding thread so you can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sczesny

customer_reviews.title: Dry grass
customer_reviews.text: I suggest not to untangle to the fullest I end up tangling some of it back up. It Gathers as you go only tested it out back around the by well house on the dogs .so far ... only lost two threads when turning rightside out ships inside out. Just tied them back on. great base to work with. I got the dry grass camo I live high desert, lower woodland mountain Seems to match well when placed on the ground and walk away. Although it will only be as good as you are at hiding...
customer_reviews.author: Ajeone04

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got my ghost ghillie today in dry grass. Spent some time “brushing” it out with my fingers. Tried it on... I think my wife was amused, but commented on how well made it appeared to be. I am very pleased. Light weight, fits well. Wrapping the rifle was no problem. Well worth the money, and got it next day delivery. I am going to enjoy this.... Well done, Arcturus!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, the “grass comes out in in bunch. Used 3 times and it is already half bold. Not talking about that the cords on the hood will drive you crazy by hanging in your face all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAM!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product! Durable but lightweight. As with any ghillie suit you should not expect to walk through the woods and not get snagged on something. Most ghillie suits are stick collectors. I used this for turkey hunting and had birds within 5 yards of me and they never even knew I was there. To me, this was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ambroz

customer_reviews.title: This was a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this thing is pretty damn silly, and I feel dumb for purchasing it. At the end of the day, It’s yarn laced through meshing. The body is alright, but the hood looks like your basic children’s arts and crafts attempt at an Old Greg cosplay. The strands fall out and catch on everything. Do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Best suit on Amazon for the price. 5 Star product here.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is made great. It has a bag to pack the suit and store it. I tired it on very comfortable and vented to let the body breathe. For me perfect. I'm a 6ft 2in 350lbs guy and it fit with plenty of room to spare. I can wear a jacket with ezzz. I got the extra large suit. I highly recommend this suit. It's an easy 5 star product. I may buy the other suit as well. Most of all great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great first buy
customer_reviews.text: Great first buy, a few strands have come off here and there, but there is literally no difference. I'm still working on getting the suit to look as "natural" as it does in the photos, but it's clear that the suit is well worth the price. Update: Almost a year has passed, and as an owner, I'm incredibly satisfied with it. Several dozens of strands have fallen out at this point while running my fingers through tangled sections, but there is no visible distinction in the suit itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Where'd My Girlfriend Go?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance who doesnt ever give 5 star reviews on anything, and when I tried to ask her what she would review it she blurted out FIVE before I could finish asking. So, make your own judgement but this thing is top notch and she never takes it off....also, it tends to pick up other natural foliage as you walk around in it which makes it even more practical.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have let this suit hang outside for 3 weeks, washed it in dead down wind detergent and the chemical smell is still really strong. If your looking at this suit for hunting keep looking as the animals will wind you for miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor made
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today an use to work with dog on guard an protection so he dont know who or what it is but very disappointed wore it for ten minutes an threads falling out big time and doubt I'd try to use it to hunt in it wouldn't stay together long enough to make it on stand..
customer_reviews.author: Greg Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Ghillie suit is well made, durable, and comfortable. I was concerned that it might be too hot, but it is constructed in a way that keeps you cooler than I expected. It would be nice if it had openings in the pants to reach through to the front pockets in your pants underneath the suit (but that's not hard to add).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money! For the poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! But just like everyone else said this thing is poorly put together chunks of jute or string or whatever you want to call just falls off by the hand fulls hope the rest stays on there. Maybe I will pick up enough brush and twigs while I’m walking around to make up for the missing strings lol I will put 5 stars on this even though i think it’s 3 stars just so no body misses the poor quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Aweso
customer_reviews.text: Great product very effective.Kind of great how the product absorbs all material around increasing effectiveness of camouflage. Downside is it does take on everything but it is as advertised and I’m looking to purchase another
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very good, nothing less, nothing more.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, thick enough to cover everything on you, but keep you cool. Also the gun cover is a bit odd but can make it work with a little maneuvering. Stuff will fall off but that’s that happens. It’s actually quite easy to patch and personalize. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great but when you're crawling around in the brush
customer_reviews.text: Fits great but when you're crawling around in the brush, the suit is a stick magnet. All things sticky like twigs, thorns, vines, you name it. It's a nightmare to try to pull the sticks out because it removes some of the ghillie material with it. Overall, the camouflage works great, you just blend into the environment, the suit is breathable and not very heavy, but the thing is a stick magnet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen-Ly

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghille suit ever available commercially!
customer_reviews.text: Best Ghille suit available as far as I am concerned. Built tough as advertised with a crazy amount of material. I have used many including some I built by hand in the course of training. Nothing ever equaled this product. It is perfect and the stuff bag fits great in bottom straps on my pack. I can’t say enough good about this fantastic product. To my law enforcement community this is well worth the investment. You really do become a ghost. Just incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Great ghillie suit!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how this product was advertised and the sizing is right on. I’m 5’8”, 155 lbs And I bought the adult regular and it fit perfect! Great for hunting and looking forward to deer season in less than a month. Would recommend this product to any hunter that needs unparalleled camouflage without having to sweat in it all day long. This suit also really breathes good with air going right through it to the wearer.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY A FISHER II

customer_reviews.title: Suit wears good, draw string holds good on pants
customer_reviews.text: Suit wears good, draw string holds good on pants. What i like most is the shake out you can give the suit before wearing to allow strings to settle out for a more fuller appearance. Have selected a position near a known trail, and deer have pasred by within 5 yards of me. Looking forward to upcoming season. Extra bit for use to cover rifle was good, but will require leaving it on for most of the season, but breaks up rifle view pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ramjet

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is as close to an invisibility cloak as you can get. It's a bit warm and makes more noise than regular clothes, but I can't imagine any design where these things wouldn't happen. The suit stays together well, even though it gets caught on briars and sticks. There was no noticeable odor upon arrival, and cover scent seems to take care of whatever might be there that I can't smell. Pants are a bit droopy, so clip-on suspenders are a good addition to the ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Pigwillow

customer_reviews.title: Built to last and completely covers
customer_reviews.text: An extremely high quality civilian ghille suit. Hands down better than other ones common in the market. Doesn't blend well in most foliage but it completely covers. Hot as hell. Heavy.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ghillie suit for my boyfriend for Christmas. He seems to really like it and was happy with it. When you get it in the package it doesn't look full, once you fluff it out it is thick. Like one guy said in previous reviews start by fluffing out from the bottom and work your way up. The only issue I would say is the threads do fall out easily. Fits as expected. My boyfriend is 6' tall and about 180 lbs. a med/large regular fit him perfect. This also comes with the gun wrap so you don't have to order that separate. Comes with jacket, pants and gun wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi R.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Suit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different suits from two different companies. I am keeping this one and the other one is being returned. A ghillie suit is supposed to be really thick and this one is. The other one is a joke and would not hide a plant wearing the other suit. You have to kind of fluff up the threads, but it looks like the picture and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin'

customer_reviews.title: This is the Ghillie suit you'll be glad you bought!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. After 2 hours of separating the strings I only had 4 laying on the floor. They were really well attached. Hint...After separating the strings hang it upside down and do it again. It really adds bulk and depth to the suit. After I scare all of the neighborhood kids with it this Halloween I'll spend some time bow hunting in it. it's a little on the warm side to wear so dress in a cool base layer for early season hunts. I've always wanted one of these and I believe I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: No-see-um

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Construction (Double Stitching Too Loose and Too Wide to hold the jute/yarn)
customer_reviews.text: If you intend on crawling around on the ground or walking through the woods with this suite, you will not be happy with it's construction. Despite the claims of 'added' material. Most of that material can simply be pulled off with one hand and thrown in the floor. The double stitching is there, but the stitches are too wide and too loose to hold the 'yarn' to the mesh. This suit would make a wonderful halloween costume, but for actual use in the outdoors... don't expect it to hold up for very long without some heavy sewing machine work.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Invisible
customer_reviews.text: This an awesome Ghillie suit it is very comfortable and can camouflage into anything if you want a good quality suit this a must also buy a suit that is slightly larger than you normally would were, this gives a more inhuman shape and better camouflage also the ankle parts tighten so you don't have to worry about tripping over it all the time. For even better camouflage roll in leaves or whatever you're surroundings have in them, the fibers will catch them and trap them to you giving you the appearance of whatever you rolled in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Halloween costume, but also because I love ghillie suits. For the price I honestly wasn’t disappointed. It fit me well, comfortable to wear, it keeps you pretty warm and was the main attraction at a Halloween party. Just gotta be careful with dead/dry leaves since they tend to easily get attached to the material.
customer_reviews.author: 21 Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy, 6'1", 300 lbs. or so. Great fit and comfortable. I read prior reviews and was concerned about the threads falling out. So far, not the case at all. No loose threads out of the box, used it this past Saturday for Pa. Spring gobbler. No luck on the bird, but the suit held up well. The long threads allow you to mix in local vegetation, which i did, added some pine needles and oak leaves, which seemed to shake out quite well when done.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Coogan

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Has small gaps between layers. Strings like to come off while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Brady

customer_reviews.title: “Poof” “Hard to detect and find this ghost”
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this item, good quality, built and designed well just what I expected. Compatible with what I used when in service.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Rio

customer_reviews.title: Nice hunting Addition
customer_reviews.text: Great suit , a few loose strings but that's to be expected with all the yarn. ,the inner liner the suit is made of seems durable. fits a 5'10" guy well. Before you hunt in this you will need to de-scent it and let it air a while, it smells like new Carpet :)
customer_reviews.author: anonymous buyer

customer_reviews.title: Almost got stepped on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these, one for my son and one for myself for a two day paintball scenario game. We both almost got stepped on by players of both sides, as they didn’t see us. The pants, jacket, and gun wrap hide is very well. My only recommendation would be to use either different lengths of the material or stagger the sew lines to help break up the “steps” in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just as listed. Quality built. Good looking material. Sure could hide out in the woods with it. Well made. Nothing cheap looking here. Plenty of material to hide you.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The suit fits great and blends in really well. I had birds landing on me throughout the hunt! I was especially surprised with how cool it was. I live in a warm, humid part of Texas, and I was comfortable in the morning and evening. I'm considering getting the desert pattern for hunting out west.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Coffman

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. The assembly is good, mainly stitching wise. Yes, it takes some time to de-tangle it but it is worth it. I did not untangle everything on the torso but the legs you can see what it looks like when you take the time to do it. The rifle shroud is also very nice as pictured works well. One of the best parts about this suit is, you turn it inside out, roll it up, put it into the bag it came with and away you go.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Burks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camouflage I have ever used. Been in the field many times and have had both game and other hunters almost step on me. Was surprised last week when a pair of beagles came from behind, jumped on me and started licking me. Their human hunting partner showed up and apologised. Guess I can't hide from everything. Some hunters laugh but I don't care. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Waller

customer_reviews.title: Arcturus ghost ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: First I must say..I've wanted one of these for awhile...was skeptical on which one to choose. Well I chose well...this suit is sturdy at 6lb or more depending on what you add to it, to blend in with you're environment...thread does not come out like other brands..well ventalated.love it..Chris m love
customer_reviews.author: Chrislove

customer_reviews.title: Ghillie costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16 yr old grandson and he loves it and will use for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bayerlee

customer_reviews.title: not bad construction......
customer_reviews.text: un necessary amount of material in my opinion... could be trimmed though....
customer_reviews.author: budgetmaster

customer_reviews.title: For deer hunting this suit provides the perfect amount of camo and can even fool people
customer_reviews.text: For 100$ you CANNOT beat this price. For deer hunting this suit provides the perfect amount of camo and can even fool people. I highly recommend but do suggest that if you do buy this for hunting to use natural methods of eliminating the factory scent like using pine branches and dirt. DO NOT WASH IN THE WASHER you will lose this string attached and it will tangle beyond how it is out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. Its well made and the material is top shelf. I was impressed with the fit and comfort. I cant wait to see the Desert.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Turkey Hunting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ghost Ghille Suit for turkey hunting. It worked phenomenal. I had a turkey in a direct line of sight about 25ft from me, and when I went to shoot, my gun was jammed. I worked the pump action, aimed the gun, and repeated this cycle about five times before it finally fired. All the meanwhile, the ghille suit gave me the protection I needed to stay concealed while dealing with this issue. I ended up taking the turkey, and I couldn't be any happier with this ghille suit!
customer_reviews.author: wiscback

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well. As described. used as Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a Halloween costume.... added a mask and hid in the bushes/trees. Had a great time
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality throughout on the make
customer_reviews.text: Extreme! This item was delivered fast. Perfect quality throughout on the make. Looks amazing lots of thread no recognizable patterns in the colors also they have no light reflection quality even when wet. this is great!. The dirtier it gets from use the better it looks. I have had many ghillie suits, this one is the best. And great price. Add some local foliage and become invisible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting i guess
customer_reviews.text: I love the camo this provides while im hunting but it snags on everything leaving a trail behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Bhutjolokia

customer_reviews.title: Great Gillie Suit
customer_reviews.text: Great Gillie Suit. Lots of strings. Sewn very well. Drawstring in the pants and jacket. Hood big enough for a boonie hat. Perfect coloring for the south east. Well done. Have already recommended them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as an early Christmas gift and he LOVES it!! I was nervous about buying him one of these as I know NOTHING about Ghillie Suits. However the reviews on this product seem to be spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and coverage. Definitely need to somewhat brush out the strands before use. Found this easiest to do with my fingers. Takes time, but improves look and coverage greatly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The photos are misleading. They layer the ghillie string but there is too much space in between each layer creating empty spots. It's a decent color and comfortable. For the price I figured it was like that but I took a chance. I did not really try the gun wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good, double stitching, seems durable , will update if this changes
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: GOOD JOB ARCTURUS!
customer_reviews.text: Havent had a chance to try it for hunting on my farm.but did try it on and it fit just fine and seems to be made of quality material and couldnt find any bare places. never owned a ghillie suit before but the colors seem like they will work for my area just fine.it seems to be even more than i expected.good job Arcturus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a bush
customer_reviews.text: It's work really good for hiding in bushes watching stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Even fit me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 325 pounds but was still able to wear this, surprisingly. I'm really pleased with it. Had fun on Halloween. People stood right next to me and had no clue I was there.
customer_reviews.author: David Belleville

customer_reviews.title: ghillie review
customer_reviews.text: Nice and dark. I plan on seeing how good I can see out of it and maybe ride my mower while wearing this. AND I plan on going to WalMart on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Crane

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: my friends couldn't even see me as they walked right by me in a bush, no less than 3 feet away. love it!! recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your camouflage arsenal
customer_reviews.text: Bought the suit for extra camouflage during duck hunting. The coverage is very good and it matches the dry grass colors in local wetland areas. The gun cover is made for a rife with scope and I will probably not uses because the strings will get stuck in the slide of the shotgun. You can use as the entire suit or just the jacket / hood with waders to work the water areas.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a draw string in the pants, but the pants fit good so it is not a problem. I am 6' 2" and weigh around 205 lbs. The suit seems to have a large amount of material and hides you extremely well. With the large amount of material that the suit has, I was surprised how cool the suit was. At the time that I wore it, it was 90 degrees outside. I plan on getting the dry grass colored suit as well this coming winter. I would recommend this suit to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gibson

customer_reviews.title: The animals were not able to pick me out and i pretty much hid in plain sight
customer_reviews.text: I tried the suit for the first time. The animals were not able to pick me out and i pretty much hid in plain sight! I just crouched like a bush. I do have things to learn, i put myself in a position to not be able to turn and shoot. That cost me a few birds. I would definetly recogment their suits!! Well thought out and put together good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes one invisible!
customer_reviews.text: If one could be "in love" with a camo suit, then I am deeply in love. This is well-made and well-hung... with hairy bits that literally turn me invisible right off the trail. Hikers walk by me and don't even notice. I've become a lump of walking moss or an Ent, like Treebeard, who can now moss right up to a moose or mouse, owl or Orc. Fabulous suit, Arcturus! I'll now try it out as evening dress at the king's party. Ta!
customer_reviews.author: Mossy

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad suit. I proved it works first time out ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad suit. I proved it works first time out had two deer and an armadillo not see me and within ten feet of each. The stitching could be closer together and the bag it comes in is way too small to put the suit back in once your done. This suit needs pockets. Overall not bad for the price, shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: craig foland

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it. I haven't had a chance to take ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. I haven't had a chance to take it out yet. Scared my father-in-law pretty good though! Fortunately he doesn't have a gun.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Stone

customer_reviews.title: Wear your duck blind
customer_reviews.text: The photo at my duck blind shows the color of the grass in late September. By duck season my Arcturus ghost ghillie suit is going to be the perfect camouflage.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R. Davido

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Use it for photography of birds
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Use it for photography of birds. Looks exactly like the picture. Lots of threads. As other reviewers stated, you need to do some finger combining from time to time. I think it was worth the money, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: john b.

customer_reviews.title: It does shed a bit but expected as it is a ghillie  suit
customer_reviews.text: Great camo for hunting and wildlife photos.. Fits great and quite durable..
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Medium for 5’7” 155# male fit perfectly. My dog couldn’t even find me in the back yard 😂 A special thanks to the delivery driver for hauling my trash can in from the street too!
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage. Not perfect. But good.
customer_reviews.text: With 7 lbs of yarn i expected more coverage on it to be honest BUT it fits very well. The colors are exactly as pictured which i DIDN'T expect but was awesome too see. Is give 5 stars if the actual coverage on it was more but otherwise i think 4 stars is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Short

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's done everything I wanted it too. Performance aside it came with a bag to store it which is nice and another piece ( I've been using it to wrap around my face so the only part of me that's not camo is from my eyes to my forehead.) I'd recommend this to everyone if they want this type of superior camo.
customer_reviews.author: David Parks

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. I got it, opened it and hung it up and started to straighten the strings out, it started falling apart right away. I stopped, packed it up and sent it back. It it can't stand up to my hands straighten it out it would never stand up to brush.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't need a ghost Ghillie suit? Well, you should get one!
customer_reviews.text: this was awesome! would doesn't need a ghost ghillie suit? for hunting, Halloween, spooking the kids...etc. Spray paint it, to look like chewbacca! Its wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: N.L.T

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 love it
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I got this, and let me say I was excited. As my first ghilloe suit I don't have a lot of experience with them but, I would definitely buy another one of these. There is plenty of string on them, a couple straggler string but that can be expected. Very breathable and well built 10/10 I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great marsh camo
customer_reviews.text: Blends in great with fall grasses. Challenging to bow hunt out of but that's the point.
customer_reviews.author: dean g

customer_reviews.title: Ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: My son wore this for Halloween,we had a lot of fun with this .good quality and delivered on time .
customer_reviews.author: sherry mccormack

customer_reviews.title: Ghille suite
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for over other clothing if needed. Very good pattern and coverage
customer_reviews.author: Chirpy

customer_reviews.title: had some does come right up to me and never ...
customer_reviews.text: had some does come right up to me and never saw me until I moved, then they made all kinds of noises trying to figure out what I was, neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my buddies couldn't find me when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my buddies couldn't find me when I challenged them to. I was in mostly ivy/tall weeds in an oak/maple forest. Product fits somewhat large in jeans and a tee shirt, would be perfect in the colder weather with a puffy jacket under it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise
customer_reviews.text: My Ghillie Suit fit as expected. I ordered my size an was correct. It is very well made and looking forward to using! I had also ordered two rifle Wraps without realizing it came with one. They also where of good quality. Now i have three rifles that are covered so good deal anyway. Would Buy again!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Be a  ghost . You will be in this.
customer_reviews.text: The ghillie suit is perfect . It's great quality and serves its purpose.... Use it right and you won't be found. Remember , you fire more than two rounds and your found. 1 at night. Watch your 6 and move out. Great cover..
customer_reviews.author: keith small

customer_reviews.title: the first was years ago and a disappointment. This one is well maid and very thick
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ghillie purchase, the first was years ago and a disappointment. This one is well maid and very thick. I am 6'2" and about 230lbs. The XL fits perfect with room for marm gear underneath. The hood works well. I use a face cover under the eyes and the hood draped down for complete cover. I use this for turkey hunting in Michigan during the spring. The colors are pretty much spot on. Not to bright.
customer_reviews.author: USJudo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this ghillie suit! Will be put to use when I stream my COD gameplay...also for Halloween and to hide in my woods to have people try to find me! KING OF HIDE N SEEK! Very well made and my cat HATES it hahaha!!
customer_reviews.author: nicknackdaddyack

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my nephew perfectly. Good quality material. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: takes a little time to straighten out the material from the crush packing but it is a very good ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, takes a little time to straighten out the material from the crush packing but it is a very good ghillie suit. I have used it the last couple of weeks stalking hogs, and they come right up, never knowing you are there. I would recommend this product to my best friend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick mesh!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6' 2" tall and this fit me perfectly. The strands are nice and thick and i like that it came with a nice mesh bag. I cant wait to get some use out of it .
customer_reviews.author: Heath Valley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed picks up leaves and small twigs to blend in to the natural environment
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price and looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price and looks wonderful. But for best effect, leave yourself a couple of hours to comb out the threads and get rid of clumps as shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Salmon

customer_reviews.title: SPEND THE EXTRA 40 BUCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to scare the neighborhood kids on Halloween, and its AWESOME. So realistic, definitely worth the money. No one saw me. You have to fluff it when you get it, but once you do its great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the living room then sat on the couch for like two hours
customer_reviews.text: I put on the suit in the living room then sat on the couch for like two hours. With out the suit my back gets too hot but the suit has the perfect amount of air movement. That's not what I got it for. They should make recliners like that.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Good

customer_reviews.title: suit fit very comfortably with plenty of room to move
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 230 lbs, generally wear a 2xl shirt and pants with 40" waist, suit fit very comfortably with plenty of room to move. Only complaint is the hood design, a bit funky, but should work OK with a cap on under it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I'm 5'11" 230 and it fit like it was made for me. Would buy again. X large regular.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Z.

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect on me
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect on me, I'm 6'2 and was surprised, Once you get it through some thorns and such you just gotta take care of it or it'll end up a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits just like it says it does. Smells like new carpet. Trying to get the smell out before bow season. Been hanging on the garden fence for 2 weeks. Getting a little better...
customer_reviews.author: Wade Featherngill

product_meta.title: Arcturus Ghost Ghillie Suit for Men | Dense, Double-Stitched Design | Superior Camo Hunting Clothes for Men, Hunters, Military, Sniper Airsoft and Paintball
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :16 x 10 x 8 inches; 5.6 Pounds
 * Item model number :AZ6019WM
 * Date First Available :October 10, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Arcturus Camo
 * ASIN :B009O5SGN0

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #12,120 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #19 inHunting Camouflage Accessories 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars686 ratings
feature_bullets: DENSE, FULL COVERAGE: You'll be hard pressed to find a ghillie suit with this much coverage and density. The Ghost Ghillie conceals you with nearly 6 pounds of synthetic, silent, water-resistant thread. That's more cover, more stalking, and more kills.

BUILT TO LAST: We minimize the shedding that occurs on all ghillie suits by double-stitching all thread on the Ghost. While most other ghillies single-stitch, our double-stitch locks in the thread, dramatically reducing shedding while adding durability.
ADVANCED 3D CAMO: Our Ghost Woodland Ghillie Suit for men is made with a 7-color blend - 4 shades of green, tan, black and brown - making it ideal for most wooded areas.

THE REVIEWS SAY IT ALL: We use these suits ourselves so we're particular about each piece of the ghillie suit and the feedback shows our commitment to quality. These hunting suits are ideal for situations where you need deep camouflage that quickly break up your profile.

4 SIZES: Kids (for kids 4'0" to 5'0"), Young Adult (5'1"-5'6"), Regular (5'6"-6'0") and Extra-Large (6'0" and over). Each Ghost Ghillie comes in a mesh carry case & includes adjustable pants, button jacket with attached hood, & an elastic ghillie rifle wrap.
